alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 04 at 9:00PM MST until January 05 at 8:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility of one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In South Dakota, Butte County, the Northern Meade County Plains, the Southern Meade County Plains and Southern Perkins County. In Wyoming, Northeastern Crook County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists may encounter areas of frosty and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
